Comment: The best way to enter the Philidor
The best way to enter the Philidor

This was the first time that one of my opponents had allowed me to reach a Philidor.  Up to this point everyone had played 4.f4 which is fine for Black.  See for example:  http://gameknot.com/annotation.pl/the-philidor-getting-my-feet-wet-internet?gm=45300
This natural move prepares for short castling.

The game has reached the main line of the Philidor Hanham.   The two most popular plans for Black are: (1)  aiming for Queenside expansion by means of ...b5, or (2) securing c5 for his knight.  The second plan would be reached by ...a5, sometimes preceded by the exchange ...exd4.
?! an inaccuracy.  The two main lines are 7. a4 and 7.Qe2

Nisipeanu-Baurer, Bastia 2001 went. 7... c6 8. a4 Nxe4! 9. Bxf7+ (9. Nxe4 d5 10. Nxe5 Nxe5 11. dxe5 dxe4 (11... dxc4 12. Nd6)) 9... Rxf7 10. Nxe4 exd4 11. Nfg5 Bxg5 12. Qxd4 d5.  7.Be3?! would have allowed the same trick.
